E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 6/20/1978
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Jim Maloney



Date: Monday, 6/23/1978
Subject: Progress of Casey Parsons
Dear Sir,
Casey Parsons has an AVG of .296 at A Spartanburg Phillies!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 7/5/1978
Subject: Craig Stimac healing process
Craig Stimac is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 7/8/1978
Subject: Progress of Keith Comstock
Dear Sir,
Keith Comstock is doing pretty good at A Spartanburg Phillies!
He has an ERA of 2.95, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/14/1978
Subject: Progress of Freddie Martinez
Dear Sir,
Freddie Martinez has nothing more to prove at A Spartanburg Phillies!
He has an ERA of 3.19 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/28/1978
Subject: Progress of Ryne Sandberg
Dear Sir,
Ryne Sandberg has nothing more to prove at A Spartanburg Phillies!
He has an AVG of .301 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

to promote him soon!

Regards,
